Package com.atakmap.android.mapcompass

Class CompassArrowMapComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.maps.AbstractMapComponent
      • com.atakmap.android.mapcompass.CompassArrowMapComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, MapComponent, Marker.OnTrackChangedListener, MapMenuEventListener, AbstractParentWidget.OnWidgetListChangedListener, MapWidget.OnClickListener, MapWidget.OnLongPressListener, MapWidget.OnWidgetPointChangedListener, AtakMapView.OnMapMovedListener, AtakMapView.OnMapProjectionChangedListener
    public class CompassArrowMapComponent
extends AbstractMapComponent
implements Marker.OnTrackChangedListener, MapWidget.OnClickListener, android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, MapWidget.OnLongPressListener, AtakMapView.OnMapMovedListener, MapWidget.OnWidgetPointChangedListener, AtakMapView.OnMapProjectionChangedListener, AbstractParentWidget.OnWidgetListChangedListener, MapMenuEventListener
    Map component that shows the direction of north using an arrow. Allows toggle of track up / north up modes by clicking.

    NOTE: This class is currently not in use and is currently kept for reference purposes.

    For new compass implementation see NavView

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.atakmap.android.maps.AbstractMapComponent
